features: SHAVE BUTTER – A uniquely slick formula for all hair and skin types. Goes on thin, easily spreads and wont run. Your razor will effortlessly glide, giving you the closest and best shaving experience. No matter what your skin type, from dry to sensitive skin, whether your hair is coarse or fine, you’ll experience the closest, smoothest headslick shaving experience free of razor burn or irritation.

EXTREME MOISTURIZING PROPERTIES- We formulated Code 3 Shave Butter to nourish your skin before, during and after you shave. Our moisturizing formula leaves your skin feeling silky smooth and moisturized without using an aftershave. Provides the best shave for a bald head or face. Better than shaving cream or gel.

NATURAL INGREDIENTS- Cruelty Free, No Harsh Chemicals, Paraben free, Sulfate Free, Non GMO. Our formula uses only natural ingredients that protect nourish and moisturize your skin. Ingredients like Tea Tree Oil, Shea Butter, Peppermint Oil, and Aloe Vera, which make this shave butter so effective.
BARBER GRADE – Our exceptional formula stands up to the rigorous demands of Barbers and haircare professionals. Bring the smooth shaving products professionals use into your routine.
MADE IN THE USA- All CODE 3 products are formulated and manufactured in Southern California by a leading GCMP certified cosmetic laboratory.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Code 3 Shave Butter. Fight Razor Burn. Are you tired of razor burn, redness or irritated skin that comes with shaving? That's why we formulated Code 3 Shave Butter. Our proprietary formula was developed to give you a close, comfortable shave without razor burn, bumps, redness or irritation, no matter what type of razor you use. With our concentrated formula, Code 3 shave butter is a low lather, ultra-slick formula so any blade can glide effortlessly over your skin. You get a close, comfortable, irritation free shave, every time.

No Redness or Razor Burn Gives you a close, comfortable shave, without redness or razor burn Super slick formula, allows razor blade to glide effortlessly Leaves skin smooth and irritation free Proprietary Formula, Barber Grade Formulated for Shaving Head, Face and Body. Head face body A close shave with any blade Superior natural ingredients and incredible results. Fights nicks, razor burn and skin irritation Exceptional Shaving Experience Code 3 gives you an exceptional shaving experience. Why? Most shaving creams and gels are filled with air. Code 3 is concentrated with our proprietary blend of natural ingredients that are ultra slick allowing your razor to glide easily preventing nicks, razor burn and irritation. Enjoy a clean, comfortable shave.

Code 3 Beard Oil Code 3 Body Wash Code 3 Eye Protection Cream Code 3 Face Protection Cream SPF 30 Tactical Skincare For Men BEARD OIL-Formulated to moisturize and nourish beard hair and skin while eliminating beard-ruff (itching and dandruff) for a groomed and attractive beard. BODYWASH- Moisture rich formula designed for men who want a clean, hydrated and refreshed showering experience. UNDER-EYE CREAM-Anti-aging formula nourishes and moisturizes the skin under and around the eyes to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles. FACE PROTECTION SUNSCREEN- Formulated with SPF 30 to hydrate, nourish and revitalize skin while providing broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays to help prevent premature signs of aging caused by the sun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shave Butter
reviews.reviewText: This shave butter is very moisturizing and helps provide a comfortable shave. The directions don't indicate applying water to your face before applying, but that seems to be the better than not doing so. Just apply a small amount of water to your face first and there is a wonderful long lasting moisturizing effect. The fragrance is pleasant and not too strong. For me, this has eliminated the need for an after shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Code3 Shave Butter
reviews.reviewText: I have used many shaving creams and never been satisfied with any of the shaving gels/ creams because they left my skin to dry or to oily. I had a friend recommend Code3 shave butter cream and I decided to try it out because I figured I had nothing to lose. I’m so happy for trying Code3 shave butter because this has been a game changer when it comes to shaving my head and facial hair. My skin is left soft, moist, and not irritated after I’m done shaving. This is the greatest shaving product that I have used. Thank you for not cutting corner with the ingredients to make this product. I’m a satisfied customer and will continue buying this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brent Palmer review
reviews.reviewText: After trying the product, it really help with my skin. Being African American, I easily bump. But after trying this, it eliminated that problem. The body wash and shave butter is a must buy. I recommend it to all walks on earth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes shaving much more comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shave product out!
reviews.reviewText: Great shave butter! Very nice smell. Leaves your face smooth and bump free after each shave. Recommended by a coworker! (RE)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok, more of a shave cream
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so I can say I do not care for this product myself. It’s more of a shave cream than a shave butter. My head may have been spoiled for years by another company that rhymes with Hollar Dave’s Lub. That stuff is a shave butter. This one will get the job down and I will use it as I spent a lot more than I spend on the the other brands but, I will not enjoy it.
